languages.text: {n}Висы сплетаются друг с другом, повествуя о подвиге каждого из мертвых братьев Ульфара. С невозможной точностью в каждой детали Волк перечисляет свершения своих товарищей, убитых ими врагов и принесенные ими жертвы. Это длится долго, и суровый напев вводит вас в транс. Камень со скрипом царапает лезвие ножа, вычерчивая все новые имена.{/n}

{n}The verses weave together, recounting the deeds of each of Ulfar's dead brothers. With incredible precision in every detail, the Wolf lists the accomplishments of his comrades, the enemies they slew, and the sacrifices they made. The saga continues at length, and the relentless rhythm sends you into a trance. With a grinding screech, the rock is drawn across the knife blade again and again, inscribing one name after another.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Висы сплетаются друг с другом, повествуя о подвиге каждого из мертвых братьев Ульфара. Камень со скрипом царапает лезвие ножа, вычерчивая все новые имена.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些诗句交织在一起，叙述着乌尔法每位战死兄弟的事迹。他颂唱着每位战友的功绩，包括他们杀死的敌人，以及他们做出的牺牲，每个细节都精确得令人难以置信。他口中的史诗绵延不绝地流淌着，毫不间断的节奏令你不禁为之恍惚。伴随着磨擦的尖啸声，石头一次次划过刀刃，刻下了一个又一个名字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The verses weave together, recounting the deeds of each of Ulfar's dead brothers. With incredible precision in every detail, the Wolf lists the accomplishments of his comrades, the enemies they slew, and the sacrifices they made. The saga continues at length, and the relentless rhythm sends you into a trance. With a grinding screech, the rock is drawn across the knife blade again and again, inscribing one name after another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些诗句交织在一起，叙述着乌尔法每位战死兄弟的事迹。他颂唱着每位战友的功绩，包括他们杀死的敌人，以及他们做出的牺牲，每个细节都精确得令人难以置信。他口中的史诗绵延不绝地流淌着，毫不间断的节奏令你不禁为之恍惚。伴随着磨擦的尖啸声，石头一次次划过刀刃，刻下了一个又一个名字。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの亡き同胞ひとりひとりの偉業が語られると、ひとつの詩が織りなされていく。狼は驚くべき正確さで仲間の功績、倒した敵、そして払った犠牲など、万事詳細を語った。サーガは長々と続き、間断ないリズムにあなたはトランス状態に入る。身を削る鋭い音と共に、岩はナイフの刃と何度もぶつかり合い、名前を次々に刻んでいく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The verses weave together, recounting the deeds of each of Ulfar's dead brothers. With incredible precision in every detail, the Wolf lists the accomplishments of his comrades, the enemies they slew, and the sacrifices they made. The saga continues at length, and the relentless rhythm sends you into a trance. With a grinding screech, the rock is drawn across the knife blade again and again, inscribing one name after another.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Estrofa tras estrofa narran las hazañas de cada uno de los hermanos muertos de Ulfar. Sin omitir un solo detalle, el Lobo narra sus gestas, los enemigos a los que abatieron y los sacrificios que realizaron. La saga continúa, incesante, con un ritmo hipnótico e incansable, acompañado del chirrido de la roca contra la hoja del cuchillo, que talla los nombres uno tras otro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The verses weave together, recounting the deeds of each of Ulfar's dead brothers. With incredible precision in every detail, the Wolf lists the accomplishments of his comrades, the enemies they slew, and the sacrifices they made. The saga continues at length, and the relentless rhythm sends you into a trance. With a grinding screech, the rock is drawn across the knife blade again and again, inscribing one name after another.{/n}

Sin omitir un solo detalle, el Lobo narra sus gestas, los enemigos a los que abatieron y los sacrificios que realizaron. La saga continúa, incesante, con un ritmo hipnótico e incansable, acompañado del chirrido de la roca contra la hoja del cuchillo, que talla los nombres uno tras otro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les vers s'enchaînent pour relater les hauts faits de chacun des défunts frères d'Ulfar. Le Loup énumère avec une incroyable précision les exploits de ses camarades, les ennemis qu'ils ont tués et les sacrifices qu'ils ont faits. La longue saga se poursuit sur un rythme lancinant qui vous met en transe, tandis que la pierre court encore et encore sur la lame du couteau pour inscrire un nom après l'autre dans un crissement aigu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The verses weave together, recounting the deeds of each of Ulfar's dead brothers. With incredible precision in every detail, the Wolf lists the accomplishments of his comrades, the enemies they slew, and the sacrifices they made. The saga continues at length, and the relentless rhythm sends you into a trance. With a grinding screech, the rock is drawn across the knife blade again and again, inscribing one name after another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les vers s'enchaînent pour relater les hauts faits de chacun des défunts frères d'Ulfar. Le Loup énumère avec une incroyable précision les exploits de ses camarades, les ennemis qu'ils ont tués et les sacrifices qu'ils ont faits. La longue saga se poursuit sur un rythme lancinant qui vous met en transe, tandis que la pierre court encore et encore sur la lame du couteau pour inscrire un nom après l'autre dans un crissement aigu.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Verse verweben sich und berichten von den Taten jedes einzelnen der toten Brüder von Ulfar. Mit unglaublicher Präzision im Detail listet der Wolf die Errungenschaften seiner Kameraden auf, welche Feinde sie erschlagen und welche Opfer sie gebracht haben. Die Saga ist lange, und der beständige Rhythmus versetzt dich in Trance. Wieder und wieder wird der Stein über die Klinge gezogen, ein Name nach dem anderen eingraviert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The verses weave together, recounting the deeds of each of Ulfar's dead brothers. With incredible precision in every detail, the Wolf lists the accomplishments of his comrades, the enemies they slew, and the sacrifices they made. The saga continues at length, and the relentless rhythm sends you into a trance. With a grinding screech, the rock is drawn across the knife blade again and again, inscribing one name after another.{/n}

Die Saga ist lange, und der beständige Rhythmus versetzt dich in Trance. Wieder und wieder wird der Stein über die Klinge gezogen, ein Name nach dem anderen eingraviert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mısralar bir araya gelerek Ulfar'ın rahmetli kardeşlerinin başarılarını anlatıyor. Kurt, her türlü detaya gösterdiği inanılmaz hassasiyetle yoldaşlarının başarılarını, katlettikleri düşmanları ve yaptıkları fedakarlıkları listeliyor. Destan uzun bir süre devam ediyor, durmak bilmeyen ritmiyle seni transa sokuyor. Taş, isimler birbiri ardına üzerine kazınırken tiz bir ses eşliğinde bıçağa tekrar tekrar sürtüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The verses weave together, recounting the deeds of each of Ulfar's dead brothers. With incredible precision in every detail, the Wolf lists the accomplishments of his comrades, the enemies they slew, and the sacrifices they made. The saga continues at length, and the relentless rhythm sends you into a trance. With a grinding screech, the rock is drawn across the knife blade again and again, inscribing one name after another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mısralar bir araya gelerek Ulfar'ın rahmetli kardeşlerinin yaptıklarını anlatıyor. Kurt, her türlü detaya gösterdiği inanılmaz hassasiyetle yoldaşlarının başarılarını, katlettikleri düşmanları ve yaptıkları fedakarlıkları listeliyor. Destan uzun bir süre devam ediyor ve durmak bilmeyen ritim seni trans hâline sokuyor. Taş, birbiri ardına isimler üzerine kaznırken bıçağa tekrar tekrar tiz bir ses eşliğinde sürtünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
